BIO

A self-motivated, self-taught web developer and a graphic designer. Quest to work and learn in a real professional and vying ambience that enables me to cope with the emerging as well as latest technology and scope for widening the spectrum of my knowledge.

July 2021 - Current

AntStack Technologies

Front-end Web Developer Intern

Learned new emerging technologies and took initiative to offer technical direction and creative solutions. Assisted with creating cross-platform UI web components and built some responsive applications using front-end frameworks.

April 2021 - June 2021
